products.name: Smart Ones Tasty American Favorites Homestyle Turkey Breast with Stuffing

extendedInfo.detail: Turkey breast with herb-bread stuffing, gravy, and vegetables.  21 g protein per serving. 270 calories; 5 g fat; 4 g fiber; 21 g protein.  No preservatives.  Tasty. American favorites. Freezing is a simple way to keep foods fresh. That's why we don't add preservatives to this entree and you can have delicious cuisine all year long! Facebook. Pinterest. Scan here for more food information. Call 1-800-762-0228 for more food information.  Phone us: 1-800-762-0228, Monday - Friday. Write us: Kraft Heinz Foods, Consumer affairs, P.O. Box 57, Pittsburgh, PA 15230. Visit us online: www.EatYourBest.com. Learn more & sign-up for savings at eatyourbest.com.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Vegetable Blend (Roasted Red Potatoes, Carrots, Green Beans, Water, Dried Onion, Dried Turkey Broth, Granulated Garlic, Modified Cellulose, Modified Food Starch, Spices, Parsley, Salt, Xanthan Gum), Gravy (Water, Dried Turkey Broth, Turkey Base [Turkey Meat With Natural Juices, Maltodextrin, Sugar, Salt, Rendered Chicken Fat, Potato Starch, Dried Whey (Milk), Onion Powder, Yeast Extract, Spice Extractives], Modified Cornstarch, Butter [Cream, Salt], Nonfat Milk, Chicken Broth Powder [Chicken Broth, Salt, Flavorings], Half And Half [Milk, Cream], Gelatin, Spices, Molasses), Cooked Turkey Breast Medallions (Turkey Breast Meat, Water, Seasoning [Autolyzed Yeast Extract, Maltodextrin (Corn And Potato), Salt, Turkey Flavor, Turkey Stock, Flavor, Gum Arabic], Modified Cornstarch, Salt, Canola Oil, Carrageenan, Sodium Phosphate, Natural Flavoring, Paprika), Stuffing (Bread Crumbs [Enriched Bleached Flour (Wheat Flour, Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Distilled Vinegar, Contains 2% Or Less Of: Sugar, Salt, Leavening (Sodium Bicarbonate), Yeast, Spice Extractive, Dough Conditioners (Ascorbic Acid, L-Cysteine Monohydrochloride)], Water, Celery, Soybean Oil, Dried Turkey Broth, Onion, Sugar, Spices, Dehydrated Turkey Meat [Cooked Turkey, Extractives Of Rosemary], Dehydrated Celery, Garlic, Parsley), Celery.
extendedInfo.directions: See cooking instructions. Cook thoroughly. Cooking Instructions: Microwave oven only. (1) Remove tray from outer carton; pull back corner of film to vent. (2) Cook on high 3 minutes and 30 seconds. Pull back film and stir. Replace film. Cook on high for 1 minute. 4 minutes and 30 seconds. Pull back film and stir. Replace film. Cook on high for 1 minute. (3) Let stand: In microwave 1-2 minutes. When removing from microwave, hold onto the tray's side handles. Remove film. Stir and Enjoy! For food safety and best quality, follow these cooking instructions: Keep frozen until ready to use. Use caution as product and packaging will be hot. Cook thoroughly before eating. Do not reuse tray. Do not prepare in conventional or toaster oven. Adjustment to cooking time may be required due to variations in all microwave ovens. Check that product is cooked thoroughly internal temperature needs to reach 165 degrees F as measured by a food thermometer.   Keep frozen. Important: Keep frozen do not refreeze.
